product.title: Solios Lux Solar Watch with Mesh Strap 40mm in Black
product.body_html: Get with the times thanks to B Corp Certified SOLIOS solar-powered watches. Made using environmentally-friendly materials and scratch-proof technology for life on the go, each SOLIOS watch is built to last thanks to its anti-reflective and water-resistant sapphire coating. Its minimalist design and interchangeable Eco Leather and mesh stainless steel straps make it a versatile piece for any occasion. What’s more, for each SOLIOS watch sold, one acre of rainforest is restored.
